page.title: 06Population Dalgety Bay.
page.content: The population of Dalgety Bay,made up largely of professional people,tends to fluctuate because many families have to leave the area because of the husband gaining promotion or being moved to a different branch of the company he works for,in a different part of the country.Even although families leave the area new families move into the area so the population of Dalgety Bay is still increasing. At present the population is around the 6000 mark.Many of the families staying in or moving into Dalgety Bay have children of primary school age.This information was gained by looking at the rolls of the two local primary schools.One school now has a roll of approximately 470 pupils and the other over 500.Because of the increase in children of school age the building of a third school has been proposed.
